definition: represented accurately or precisely, describe in vivid detail
details:
adjective
- represented accurately or precisely
= synonyms: represented
verb
- describe in vivid detail
- make a mark or lines on a surface
= synonyms: draw
- trace the shape of
= synonyms: outline, limn
- determine the essential quality of
= synonyms: specify, delimit, delimitate, define
- show the form or outline of
= synonyms: define
